glyph.name: Boundary With Love
glyph.description: Setting clear, compassionate boundaries that protect and honor both self and others.
glyph.practice: Feel your yes and no clearly. Communicate boundaries with love. Honor others' boundaries completely.

interpretation:
A circle of soft light drawn upon the earth.
A hand extends, pausing at the glowing edge.
Luminous wildflowers blossom along the line.
visualPhrases: A circle of soft light drawn upon the earth.
A hand extends, pausing at the glowing edge.
Luminous wildflowers blossom along the line.
